Package org.jetel.ctl.extensions

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ITLFunctionLibrary
    This interface have to be implemented by all TL function engine plugins and this class name have to be passed via className attribute in plugin.xml in tlfunction extension point.
    TLFunctionPrototype  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ContainerLib  
    ConvertLib  
    CtlExtensionsMessages  
    DateLib  
    DynamicLib  
    IntegralLib
    These functions have to be part of core engine plugin, since can be invoked direct from CTL executor.
    MathLib  
    RandomLib  
    StringLib  
    StringLibExt
    Library wrapper for additional string manipulation functions for CTL2.
    TLCache  
    TLCalendarCache  
    TLCopyByNameTransformCache
    This class is used in Integral.copyByName() CTL2 function for caching of CopyByNameMapping instance.
    TLDataGeneratorCache  
    TLDateFormatLocaleCache  
    TLFormatterCache
    A base TLCache implementation that can store TLFunctionCallContext and caches Locale and TimeZoneProvider.
    TLFunctionCallContext  
    TLFunctionDescriptor  
    TLFunctionLibrary
    Recommended ascendant of all TL function libraries.
    TLFunctionLibraryDescription
    This class describes transformation function library from a plugin.
    TLFunctionLibraryExt
    Helper class used by the CTL2 function libraries for discovering the CTL functions in the library.
    TLFunctionPluginRepository
    This class provides access to TL functions stored in engine plugins.
    TLMultiCache  
    TLNumericFormatLocaleCache  
    TLObjectCache<T>
    A generic cache for one object of arbitrary type.
    TLPropertyRefResolverCache  
    TLRegexpCache  
    TLTransformationContext
    Global transformation context shared between all function calls from the same transformation.
    UtilLib  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ParameterTypeException  
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    CTL2FunctionDeclaration
    Annotation which provides additional details about CTL2 function.
    TLFunctionAnnotation  
    TLFunctionInitAnnotation
